definition: to cup one fist in the other hand (as a sign of respect)
to hold/to carry (in one's arms)/to hug/to embrace/to surround/to cherish

sentences.english: With hug a boxing, distant away empire he went one gift.
sentences.chinese: 以手抱拳，遥遥朝他行了一礼。

definition: to cup one's hands in obeisance or greeting/(fig.) submissive
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
to half rise out of one's chair (a polite gesture)
to bow deeply, starting upright with arms straight out in front, one hand cupped in the other, then moving the hands down to one's knees as one bows, keeping the arms straight (a form of greeting)
to greet by raising clasped hands
to bow with hands held in front
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
to have a smile on one's face
variant of 斂衽|敛衽[lian3 ren4]
